name: Flex Components Archive
summary: Learn about .SWC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SWC archives may also include Live Preview and Property Inspector SWF files, ActionScript (.AS) files, an .SWD debug file, and a .PNG icon file.
NOTE: Animate was formerly known as Flash, which was originally developed by Macromedia but then merged with Adobe in 2005. Flash became Animate in 2016.

description: Contains a group of components and other assets used by an Adobe Flex application; includes a .SWF file and a catalog.xml file, which lists the contents of the package and the individual components; generated by the Animate authoring tool and compressed using the PKZIP archive format.
